item.title: Migrate from MSTest to xUnit using a Roslyn analyzer
item.description: Both MSTest and xUnit are great test framework. If you are curious about, I've written many blog posts about them MSTest series If you want to migrate to xUnit from MSTest, I've written a Roslyn Analyzer. This analyzer reports all MSTest attributes and assertions in your code. It can also replace most of them with xUnit equivalent. Note that the goal of this analyzer is not to handle 100% of the cases,â€¦
